timeline.bodyText:
Maybe, REQUEST_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 5, and then use TimeUnit.SECONDS down below?
Is it enough to just go to 1 full second? 5_000 seems like a lot for just stuff that's running on an application processor, without any disk or network involved.

replies.bodyText:
Maybe, REQUEST_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 5, and then use TimeUnit.SECONDS down below?

👍

Is it enough to just go to 1 full second? 5_000 seems like a lot for just stuff that's running on an application processor, without any disk or network involved.

It probably is, but I would have thought that about 200ms as well. It's difficult to test what the best value is, so I picked something big to see if this fix even works, without spending too much time tweaking the value.
